AI Description: Chameleon is a Python library for creating customizable color palettes for data visualization purposes. It provides a user-friendly interface to easily generate aesthetically pleasing color schemes for various types of visualizations.
Core Features:
1. Generate custom color palettes
2. Easily customize color schemes
3. Compatibility with popular data visualization libraries
4. Seamless integration with Python data analysis workflows
General Tags: Python Library, Data Visualization, Color Palette, Visualization, Python
